member.summary: The name of the region that the objects to cache will be stored in.

member.name: P:NHibernate.Caches.SysCache2.CacheRegionElement.RelativeExpiration
member.summary: The number of seconds from the time an object is added into the cache until it will expire from the cache.

member.name: P:NHibernate.Caches.SysCache2.CacheRegionElement.UseSlidingExpiration
member.summary: The number of seconds from the time an object is added into the cache until it will expire from the cache.

member.name: P:NHibernate.Caches.SysCache2.CacheRegionElement.TimeOfDayExpiration
member.summary: The time of day in 24 hour format that an object added into the cache will expire from the cache.

remarks.para: Must be entered in TimeSpan format. Ex. 13:52:00 would be 1:52 pm.

members.member: Specifies the relative priority of items stored in the Cache region. .

member.summary: Gets a valid cache key for the element in the cache with .

member.name: M:NHibernate.Caches.SysCache2.SysCacheRegionBase.CacheRootItem
member.summary: Creates the cache item for the cache region which all other cache items in the region will be dependent upon.

remarks.para: Specified Region dependencies will be associated to the cache item.

member.name: M:NHibernate.Caches.SysCache2.SysCacheRegionBase.RootCacheItemRemovedCallback(System.String,System.Object,System.Web.Caching.CacheItemRemovedReason)
member.summary: Called when the root cache item has been removed from the cache.
member.param: The key of the cache item that was removed.
The value of the cache item that was removed.
The for the removal of the item from the cache.

remarks.para: Since all cache items are dependent on the root cache item, if this method is called, all the cache items for this region have also been removed.
